law.catch_line: Presumptions of survivorship when donative provisions of a governing instrument are affected.
law.text: Except as provided in KRS 397.1006, for purposes of a donative provision of a governing instrument, an individual who is not established by clear and convincing evidence to have survived an event, including the death of another individual, by one hundred twenty (120) hours is deemed to have predeceased the event.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 415, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.
